text: Maurice Samuel 'Mo' Vaughn (born December 15, 1967 in Norwalk, Connecticut) was a baseball player for the Boston Red Sox, Anaheim Angels, and New York Mets. Vaughn played first base. Ironically, despite his nickname "Hit Dog", he is best known for hitting home runs. title: Mo Vaughn
